trans-unit.source: Create an Android app on Azure App Service Mobile Apps | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create an Android app on Azure App Service Mobile Apps | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Follow this tutorial to get started with using Azure mobile app backends for Android development
trans-unit.target: Follow this tutorial to get started with using Azure mobile app backends for Android development

trans-unit.source: This tutorial shows you how to add a cloud-based backend service to an Android mobile app by using an Azure mobile app backend.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial shows you how to add a cloud-based backend service to an Android mobile app by using an Azure mobile app backend.

trans-unit.source: You will create both a new mobile app backend and a simple _Todo list_ Android app that stores app data in Azure.
trans-unit.target: You will create both a new mobile app backend and a simple _Todo list_ Android app that stores app data in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Completing this tutorial is a prerequisite for all other Android tutorials about using the Mobile Apps feature in Azure App Service.
trans-unit.target: Completing this tutorial is a prerequisite for all other Android tutorials about using the Mobile Apps feature in Azure App Service.

trans-unit.source: To complete this tutorial, you need the following:
trans-unit.target: To complete this tutorial, you need the following:

trans-unit.source: [Android Developer Tools](https://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html), which includes the Android Studio integrated development environment, and the latest Android platform.
trans-unit.target: [Android Developer Tools](https://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html), which includes the Android Studio integrated development environment, and the latest Android platform.

trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Android SDK, which is automatically referenced as part of the quickstart project you download.
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Android SDK, which is automatically referenced as part of the quickstart project you download.

trans-unit.source: A PC with [Visual Studio Community 2013] or newer—not required for a Node.js backend.
trans-unit.target: A PC with [Visual Studio Community 2013] or newer—not required for a Node.js backend.

trans-unit.source: Create a new Azure mobile app backend
trans-unit.target: Create a new Azure mobile app backend

trans-unit.source: Download and run the Android app
trans-unit.target: Download and run the Android app
